attributes.action: Make face coverings mandatory whenever you aren’t within your own property
attributes.additional_details: The current measures to prevent the spread of Covid are not adequate. Passing this would help reduce the spread of the virus with little to no cost to the government or to the Population.
attributes.background: Make it mandatory to wear a face covering in all public settings, including walking to and from a car. Automatic £1000 fines for anyone caught not wearing a mask under any circumstances, which can later be contested with proof of an exemption.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554917
